details:
firmware_loader: Fix use-after-free during unregister

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.8 by commit d380d40930a674c520a5b55f3be1eb17dc634ebc, it was introduced in version v5.19 by commit 97730bbb242cde22b7140acd202ffd88823886c9. For more details please see the references link.
